name: Gastro Run
description: Are you ready to go on an adventure where you'll have to prove your Intestinal Fortitude? Cuz if you are, here is GASTRO RUN! In Gastro Run you'll face a deadly hoard of Amoebas who's only goal is to destoy you. You must run, jump, and roll your way to victory. Do you have what it takes to make it out in the end? Or will you just be the cause of someones agony? Find out today in GASTRO RUN!
